project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password with specified requirements from the user.

task.name: Implement password generation function that includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.
Create a function to configure the password length based on user input.
Write tests for the password generation and length configuration functions.
Execute tests on the password generation functions to ensure they behave as expected.
